author: randomishwalk
content:
Thanks Barnabe for flagging this channel to me!

Can anyone else can point me to work/analysis that looks into the split of economic value captured by type of party in the MEV supply chain? Esp. curious if there's been good writing on what this might all look like post-merge w/ MEV-boost and, down the line, with PBS

Based on Flashbots explore data (which I know is incomplete), it seems like miners don't actually capture most of the MEV today which I found somewhat surprising?
